mapper.delete: delete from rss where rssId in (${ids})
mapper.select: select * from rss a left join rss_crawl b on a.rssId = b.rssId where a.rssId = #{rssId} order by b.updateTime desc limit 0,3

select a.* from rss a left join rss_subscribe b on a.rssId = b.rssId LEFT JOIN rss_type c on b.rssTypeId = c.rssTypeId where b.rssTypeId = #{rssTypeId} c.userId = #{userId} order by a.updateTime desc limit #{startPage},#{page}

select c.*,temp.*,temp.updateTime as crawlUpdateTime from (select a.* from rss_crawl a where (select count(*) from rss_crawl b where a.rssId = b.rssId and b.rssCrawlId < a.rssCrawlId) < 3 and a.rssId in (${ids}) order by a.updateTime desc) temp LEFT JOIN rss c on temp.rssId = c.rssId order by c.updateTime desc,crawlUpdateTime desc
select b.* from rss_subscribe a left join rss b on a.rssId = b.rssId where a.rssTypeId = #{rssTypeId} order by rssSubscribeId desc
